channel.title: CVE Feed for TP-Link -- TP-Link Tether
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TP-Link -- TP-Link Tether

item.title: CVE-2024-31340|2024-05-22T05:29:04.007Z -- TP-Link -- TP-Link Tether
item.description: TP-Link Tether versions prior to 4.5.13 and TP-Link Tapo versions prior to 3.3.6 do not properly validate certificates, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to eavesdrop on an encrypted communication via a man-in-the-middle attack.
